string.text:
Standard 20-caliber round filled with 6 mm buckshot. Highly lethal at close range. Only suitable for use with smooth-bore weapons
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Highest pierced armor class: %c[ui_gray_1]none
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Tissue damage rating: %c[ui_gray_1]medium - high
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]SPECIAL:
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] expanding cloud of pellets, short eff. range

Single-barreled 20ga hunting shotgun with sliding breech bolt. Widely known by it vernacular name, the Death of the Chairman, for its compact size.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: Due to the position of the stock, it is possible to install sights only with a very low mount: Barska AC10632, C-More, Docter Sight, Aimpoint T1, Trijicon RMR, Leupold DeltaPoint PRO, OKP-7, 1P76 Rakurs. 
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: None

Single-barreled 20ga hunting shotgun with sliding breech bolt. Widely known by it vernacular name, the Death of the Chairman, for its compact size.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: None 
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: None
